mtn_find: is on top of the Mountain
shiphold_find: is in the Pirate Ship Hold
agentlobbymulti_find: is in the Everyday Phoning Facility
berg_find: is on the Iceberg (hidden on your map)

help_card: If tied, the highest number wins.
help_firsttime_welcome:
Good day grasshopper,
And welcome to the Dojo.
Tell me what you seek.
help_firsttime_tobegin:
To begin training,
You will first require these cards.
Just like real ninja.
help_firsttime_improve:
To increase your rank,
You must compete in matches.
With hard work comes skill.
help_firsttime_areyouready:
Like the autumn leaf,
You must be prepared to learn.
Are you ready now?
help_firsttime_pickacard:
Each turn, both pupils
Pick a card to play. Secret.
Quiet. Like Ninja.
help_firsttime_water:
The peaceful water,
Brings its soothing harmony,
And defeats fire.
help_firsttime_snow:
The white frigid snow,
Brings with it the winter's chill,
And freezes water.
help_firsttime_fire:
Furious fire,
Brings its mighty, scorching heat,
And will melt the snow.
help_firsttime_tie:
When cards are the same,
The match is not yet over.
Highest number wins.
help_firsttime_howtowin:
Much like the Forest,
There are two paths you can walk,
To reach victory.
help_firsttime_winsame:
The first way to win:
Have three cards of the same type,
In different colors.
help_firsttime_windifferent:
The second path is:
To have one of each card type,
In different colors.
help_firsttime_ingamehelp:
If you should forget,
Mouse over the question mark,
And all will be clear.
help_firsttime_joking:
Stand in the Dojo,
Half an hour, very still.
No... wait. Just kidding.
help_firsttime_gainexp:
To become ninja,
You must gain experience,
From winning matches.
help_firsttime_belts:
As you master skills,
I will award you new belts,
Of different colors.
help_firsttime_fightme:
When you are black belt,
You must challenge me and win.
And I'm pretty good.
help_firsttime_ninja:
When you best my skill,
Then you will be true master,
And become ninja.
help_response_whatdoido: What do I do with these?
help_response_howtowin: How do I win a match?
help_response_becomeninja: How do I become a ninja?
help_award_congratulations:
Congratulations!
Much like the fearsome earthquake,
You have rocked the house.
help_award_belt_earned:
Well done. You have earned
%1 for your efforts.
I am proud of you.
help_defeat_sensei_intro:
The gentle lotus,
Cowers before the storm cloud.
But you... you did not.
help_defeat_sensei_kowtows:
Well done, grasshopper.
You have faced my skills, and won.
And proven yourself.
help_defeat_sensei_gift:
Now receive the mark
Of a Card-Jitsu master,
With this ninja mask.
help_defeat_sensei_final:
You may now join us,
In secret ninja hideout.
Congratulations!
menu_description_competition:
Do you wish to play
And compete with another
Student, grasshopper?
menu_description_sensei:
To become ninja,
You must challenge me and win.
But bring your black belt.
menu_description_instructions:
Do you wish to hear
The instructions of the game
Again, grasshopper?
pow_1: When this card is played, lower values win ties the next round.
pow_2: When this is scored, your card get +2 for the next round.
pow_3: When this is scored, your Opponent's card get -2 for the next round.
pow_4: When this is scored, discard one Opponent's Snowball card.
pow_5: When this is scored, discard one Opponent's Water card.
pow_6: When this is scored, discard one Opponent's Fire card.
pow_7: When this is scored, discard one Opponent's Red card.
pow_8: When this is scored, discard one Opponent's Blue card.
pow_9: When this is scored, discard one Opponent's Green card.
pow_10: When this is scored, discard one Opponent's Yellow card.
pow_11: When this is scored, discard one Opponent's Orange card.
pow_12: When this is scored, discard one Opponent's Purple card.
pow_13: When this is scored, Snow cannot be played next round.
pow_14: When this is scored, Fire cannot be played next round.
pow_15: When this is scored, Water cannot be played next round.
pow_16: When this is played, Water cards become Fire for this round.
pow_17: When this is played, Snowball cards become Water for this round.
pow_18: When this is played, Fire cards become Snowball for this round.
pow_19: When this is scored, discard all Opponent's Red cards.
pow_20: When this is scored, discard all Opponent's Blue cards.
pow_21: When this is scored, discard all Opponent's Green cards.
pow_22: When this is scored, discard all Opponent's Yellow cards.
pow_23: When this is scored, discard all Opponent's Orange cards.
pow_24: When this is scored, discard all Opponent's Purple cards.
